Title: Happy
Writer: A. Karunakaran (screenplay), Radha Mohan (story), S.N. Swamy (dialogue), Kona Venkat (dialogue)
Actors: Allu Arjun, Genelia D'Souza, Manoj Bajpayee, Brahmanandam
Plot: Bunny a pizza delivery boy has to marry Madhumati a caste leader's daughter due to a small mistake. But will they really fall in love
